response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which holds significant value for us. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe it could greatly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its intrinsic worth, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This offer is tailored to provide you with substantial savings while ensuring you receive a high-quality product that meets your expectations. We are confident it will be a valuable addition to your business or lifestyle. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 12000}
